title: march 18: cambridge anawhat? (with Orla Gartland)
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about Amy Klobuchar calling upon Mark Zuckerberg to testify before the Senate Judiciary Committee about the Cambridge Analytica scandal, and then gives some background on the scandal as a whole. Then, she talks about a celebrity song mashup that didn’t go as planned. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
